sqlMap.select: select ID as id, C_DEPARTUREPORT as departureport, C_ARRIVALPORT as arrivalport, C_TRAVELTYPE as traveltype, C_OUTPATTERN as outpattern, C_MONEYKEEP as moneykeep, C_POINTKEEP as pointkeep, C_FLIGHTNUMBER as flightnumber, C_CABINCODE as cabincode, C_RATEVALUE as ratevalue, C_CREATEUSER as createuser, C_CREATETIME as createtime, C_MODIFYUSER as modifyuser, C_MODIFYTIME as modifytime, C_ISSUEDSTARTDATE as issuedstartdate, C_ISSUEDENDATE as issuedendate, C_REMARK as remark, C_WEEKNUM as weeknum, C_ISENABLE as isenable, C_AIRCOMPANYCODE as aircompanycode, C_AGENTID as agentid, C_TICKETTYPE as tickettype, C_RELATIONSPZRATEID as relationspzrateid, C_AGENTCODE as agentcode, C_TYPE as type, C_UCODE as ucode, C_LANGUAGE as language, C_ISAUTO as isauto, C_ISCHANGE as ischange, C_LOCALSPZRATE as localspzrate, C_ADDRATEVALUE as addratevalue, C_GENERAL as general, C_POLL as poll, C_ZRATETYPE as zratetype from T_SPZRATE where ID = #id#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into T_SPZRATE ( ID, C_DEPARTUREPORT, C_ARRIVALPORT, C_TRAVELTYPE, C_OUTPATTERN, C_MONEYKEEP, C_POINTKEEP, C_FLIGHTNUMBER, C_CABINCODE, C_RATEVALUE, C_CREATEUSER, C_CREATETIME, C_MODIFYUSER, C_MODIFYTIME, C_ISSUEDSTARTDATE, C_ISSUEDENDATE, C_REMARK, C_WEEKNUM, C_ISENABLE, C_AIRCOMPANYCODE, C_AGENTID, C_TICKETTYPE, C_RELATIONSPZRATEID, C_AGENTCODE, C_TYPE, C_UCODE, C_LANGUAGE, C_ISAUTO, C_ISCHANGE, C_LOCALSPZRATE, C_ADDRATEVALUE, C_GENERAL, C_POLL, C_ZRATETYPE ) values (
#id#,
#departureport#,
#arrivalport#,
#traveltype:DECIMAL#,
#outpattern#,
#moneykeep:DECIMAL#,
#pointkeep:DECIMAL#,
#flightnumber#,
#cabincode#,
#ratevalue:DECIMAL#,
#createuser#,
#createtime#,
#modifyuser#,
#modifytime#,
#issuedstartdate#,
#issuedendate#,
#remark#,
#weeknum#,
#isenable:DECIMAL#,
#aircompanycode#,
#agentid:DECIMAL#,
#tickettype:DECIMAL#,
#relationspzrateid:DECIMAL#,
#agentcode#,
#type:DECIMAL#,
#ucode:DECIMAL#,
#language:DECIMAL#,
#isauto:DECIMAL#,
#ischange:DECIMAL#,
#localspzrate:DECIMAL#,
#addratevalue:DECIMAL#,
#general:DECIMAL#,
#poll:DECIMAL#,
#zratetype:DECIMAL#
)
sqlMap.update:
update T_SPZRATE set C_DEPARTUREPORT = #departureport#, C_ARRIVALPORT = #arrivalport#, C_TRAVELTYPE = #traveltype:DECIMAL#, C_OUTPATTERN = #outpattern#, C_MONEYKEEP = #moneykeep:DECIMAL#, C_POINTKEEP = #pointkeep:DECIMAL#, C_FLIGHTNUMBER = #flightnumber#, C_CABINCODE = #cabincode#, C_RATEVALUE = #ratevalue:DECIMAL#, C_CREATEUSER = #createuser#, C_CREATETIME = #createtime#, C_MODIFYUSER = #modifyuser#, C_MODIFYTIME = #modifytime#, C_ISSUEDSTARTDATE = #issuedstartdate#, C_ISSUEDENDATE = #issuedendate#, C_REMARK = #remark#, C_WEEKNUM = #weeknum#, C_ISENABLE = #isenable:DECIMAL#, C_AIRCOMPANYCODE = #aircompanycode#, C_AGENTID = #agentid:DECIMAL#, C_TICKETTYPE = #tickettype:DECIMAL#, C_RELATIONSPZRATEID = #relationspzrateid:DECIMAL#, C_AGENTCODE = #agentcode#, C_TYPE = #type:DECIMAL#, C_UCODE = #ucode:DECIMAL#, C_LANGUAGE = #language:DECIMAL#, C_ISAUTO = #isauto:DECIMAL#, C_ISCHANGE = #ischange:DECIMAL#, C_LOCALSPZRATE = #localspzrate:DECIMAL#, C_ADDRATEVALUE = #addratevalue:DECIMAL#, C_GENERAL = #general:DECIMAL#, C_POLL = #poll:DECIMAL#, C_ZRATETYPE = #zratetype:DECIMAL#
where ID = #id#
